long_description: If the skies look a little dark but a rain jacket seems like too much, the Marmot Eastside jacket is just the thing to ward off the chill and protect you from blustery days. Soft-shell fabric features 4-way stretch for maximum movement and reliably resists wind and abrasion; Durable Water Repellent finish repels moisture and stains. Marmot M3 soft-shell material is their most breathable fabric, ensuring comfort in a wide variety of temperatures. 3 front zippered pockets and 1 interior zippered pocket provide ample storage for essentials; additional interior media pocket keeps your tunes in place. Marmot Eastside jacket features DriClime(R) polyester-lined cuffs that wick away moisture and are soft against your skin.
short_description: If the skies look a little dark but a rain jacket seems like too much, the Marmot Eastside jacket is just the thing to ward off the chill and protect you from blustery days.
